{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-AX88U |revision=(AX6000) |series=AX6000 |asin=B07HM6KJN8 |newegg=N82E16833320370 |price=350 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model= |availability=now |type=wireless router |est_release_date=10/10/2018 |fcc_date=02/14/2018 |fcc_id=MSQ-RTAXHP00 |ic_id=3568A-RTAXHP00 |pcb_id=14630316940MAS |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=2.37 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM49408 |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF2G18AC-TI |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16EP-DI |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.1 (Gen 1) |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, |serial=yes,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1743 P11, X1S-01 N2 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn+ax |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1743 P11, X1S-01 N2 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac+ax |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53134S;BCM53134SKFBG, TN1710 P21, 488-06 P3 W; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz WLAN LNA;Skyworks;SKY85216-11;SKY11, 85216, 2I000;4; ,,, 2.4GHz WLAN PAM;Skyworks;SKY85006-11;85006-11, 60068, 1715 MX;4; ,,, 5GHz WLAN HP FEM;Skyworks;SKY85743-21;85743, 62475, 1733 MX;4; |flags=Wi-Fi 6, MU-MIMO, 1024QAM, VHT160, AiMesh, WTFast, TWT, LACP, Link Aggregation, AiProtection, DFS (master/slave), |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=Asuswrt-Merlin, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ax |default_ssid=ASUS_XX_2G,ASUS_XX_5G |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS_[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}_2G$,,,^ASUS_[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}_5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• '''4804''' Mbps max PHY rate for the 160MHz wide 5GHz channel, :• '''1148''' Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''AX6000'' class'''
{{TagLine|AX6000 Dual Band 802.11ax WiFi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AX88U/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=ASUS|region=us|model=RT-AX88U}} *''AX6000 Dual Band 802.11ax WiFi Router'' :Supporting MU-MIMO and OFDMA technology, :built-in WTFast game accelerator and Adaptive QoS, :with AiProtection network security powered by Trend Micro *{{WiFiCert|WFA91821|10/29/2019}} :FW: RT-AX88U_3004_384_7261 (A1.1) *Web GUI: http://router.asus.com {{see also|ASUS RT-AX95U|ASUS RT-AC88U|H3C WA6528}} The following models are mentioned as being identical in the DFS Test :Report at the FCC: (Manuf: [[Arcadyan]]) *[[ASUS RT-AX88U]], RT-AX88A, RT-AX88P, RT-AX88R, RT-AX6000 "RT-AX88U REV 2.20" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The CPU ID is not legible in the FCC photos. ===Overview=== *'''Next-Gen WiFi Standard''' - 802.11ax WiFi standard for better efficiency and throughput *'''Ultrafast WiFi Speed''' - 6 Gbps WiFi speed to handle even the busiest network with ease *'''Wider Usage and More Convenience''' - 4 antennas + 8 LAN ports to support more clients *'''Commercial-grade Security''' - AiProtection, powered by Trend Micro, blocks internet :security threats for all your connected smart devices *'''Better Partner with Mesh System''' - Compatible with ASUS AiMesh WiFi system for :seamless whole-home coverage ===News=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33179-asus-expands-lyra-mesh-family ''ASUS RT-AX88U, Lyra Mesh Family'' (CES 2018) on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.engadget.com/2018/01/08/asus-rt-ax88u-router-ces-2018/ ''ASUS RT-AX88U (CES 2018) - First 802.11ax WiFi Router'' on '''EnGadget'''] *[https://press.asus.com/release.php?id=114 ''ASUS Presents The Edge of Beyond at IFA 2017 (ASUS RT-AX88U)'' on '''ASUS'''] *[https://betanews.com/2017/08/30/asus-rt-ac88u-rt-ax88u-wi-fi-routers/ ''ASUS unveils the ultra-fast RT-AX88U 802.11ax Wi-Fi router'' on '''BetaNews'''] *[https://nl.hardware.info/nieuws/53279/ifa-asus-toont-extreem-snelle-80211ax-router ''IFA: ASUS toont extreem snelle 802.11ax-router'' on '''Hardware.info'''] ([https://content.hwigroup.net/images/editorial/1920/010462_foto_30-08-17_13_50_01.jpg image]) *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/12871/asus-announces-a-complete-lineup-of-80211ax-routers ''ASUS Announces a Complete Lineup of 802.11ax Routers'' on '''AnandTech'''] :ASUS: ROG Rapture GT-AX11000, AiMesh AX6100 WiFi System, RT-AX88U ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33217-first-wifi6-peek-asus-rt-ax88u-netgear-rax80 ''First peek at Wi-Fi 6: ASUS RT-AX88U & Netgear RAX80'' on '''SNB'''] *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/asus-rt-ax88u-review ''ASUS RT-AX88U: The first Wi-Fi 6 router'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] *[https://www.tweaktown.com/reviews/8937/asus-rt-ax88u-wi-fi-6-router-review/index.html ''Asus RT-AX88U: Our first look at WiFi 6'' on '''TweakTown'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/asus-rt-ax88u.41020/ ''ASUS RT-AC88U'' on '''SNB''' forums] (''ASUS GT-AX6000'' ROG - '''RMerlin''') *[http://forums.whirlpool.net.au/archive/2662797 ''ASUS RT-AX88U'' on '''WhirlPool''' forums] ('''pete y testing''''s posts) *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?35788-ASUS-RT-AX88U-%F1-%EF%EE%E4%E4%E5%F0%E6%EA%EE%E9-802-11ax ''ASUS RT-AX88U'' on '''wl500g.info''' forums] ([http://wl500g.info/entry.php?10248-ASUS-RT-AX88U '''Omega''''s blog]) *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r31590438-Hardware-RT-AX88U-the-first-802-11ax-ASUS-router ''ASUS RT-AX88U - 802.11ax router'' on '''DSLReports''' forums] *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1901-asus-rt-ax88u-80211ax-wi-fi/ ''ASUS RT-AX88U'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) ===See also=== :[[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] • [[List of MU-MIMO supported devices]] *[[ASUS RT-AX58U]] - ''AX3000 Dual Band 802.11ax WiFi Router *[[ASUS RT-AX88U]] - ''AX6000 Dual Band 802.11ax WiFi Router'' *[[ASUS RT-AX92U]] - ''AX6100 Dual Band 802.11ax WiFi Router'' *[[ASUS RT-AX95U]] - ''AX11000 Tri Band 802.11ax WiFi Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AX6000]] - ''ROG Rapture AX6000 WiFi Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AX11000]] - ''ROG Rapture AX11000 WiFi Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AC9600]] - ''ROG Rapture Aura 10G Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AC5300]] - ''ROG Rapture Tri-Band Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS Blue Cave]] - ''AC2600 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router'' *[[ASUS Lyra]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' *[[ASUS Lyra Mini]] - ''AC1300 Dual-Band Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' *[[ASUS Lyra Trio]] - ''AC1750 Dual Band Mesh Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33179-asus-expands-lyra-mesh-family CES 2018] *[[ASUS Lyra Voice]] -
